text: 0 Prince George grins widely in adorable new portrait to celebrate his fifth birthday Prince George of Cambridge, a future king currently living as a carefree tot in a royal palace, turns 5 years old on Sunday, giving British royal fans a chance to remember with fondness the day this much - wanted heir came into the world. And to celebrate the occasion, George's parents, Prince William and Duchess Kate of Cambridge, released his official birthday portrait Saturday. The picture was taken in the garden at Clarence House on July 9, following the christening of his baby brother, Prince Louis. Prince Louis has been getting most of the attention lately, what with his christening and the usual round of celebrations surrounding that. But George is the star of the royal show this week, as third in line to the throne behind his father, Prince
